Class RepositoryVersionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.stack.upgrade.RepositoryVersionHelper

extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • parseOperatingSystems

        public List<RepoOsEntity> parseOperatingSystems(String repositoriesJson)
                                         throws Exception
        Parses operating systems json to a list of entities. Expects json like: 
         [
    {
       "repositories":[
          {
             "Repositories/base_url":"http://s3.amazonaws.com/dev.hortonworks.com/HDP/centos6/2.x/updates/2.2.0.0",
             "Repositories/repo_name":"HDP-UTILS",
             "Repositories/repo_id":"HDP-UTILS-1.1.0.20"
          },
          {
             "Repositories/base_url":"http://s3.amazonaws.com/dev.hortonworks.com/HDP/centos6/2.x/updates/2.2.0.0",
             "Repositories/repo_name":"HDP",
             "Repositories/repo_id":"HDP-2.2"
          }
       ],
       "OperatingSystems/os_type":"redhat6"
    }
 ]
        Parameters:
        repositoriesJson - operating systems json
        Returns:
        list of operating system entities
        Throws:
        Exception - if any kind of json parsing error happened

      • createRepoOsEntities

        public List<RepoOsEntity> createRepoOsEntities(List<RepositoryInfo> repositories)

      • getUpgradePackageName

        public String getUpgradePackageName(String stackName,
                                    String stackVersion,
                                    String repositoryVersion,
                                    org.apache.ambari.spi.upgrade.UpgradeType upgradeType)
                             throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Scans the given stack for upgrade packages which can be applied to update the cluster to given repository version.
        Parameters:
        stackName - stack name
        stackVersion - stack version
        repositoryVersion - target repository version
        upgradeType - if not null null, will only return upgrade packs whose type matches.
        Returns:
        upgrade pack name
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if no upgrade packs suit the requirements

      • buildRoleParams

        public Map<String,String> buildRoleParams(AmbariManagementController amc,
                                          RepositoryVersionEntity repoVersion,
                                          String osFamily,
                                          Set<String> servicesOnHost)
                                   throws SystemException
        Build the role parameters for an install command.
        Parameters:
        amc - the management controller. Tests don't use the same instance that gets injected.
        repoVersion - the repository version
        osFamily - the os family
        servicesOnHost - the set of services to check for packages
        Returns:
        a Map to use in
        Throws:
        SystemException

      • getOSEntityForHost

        public RepoOsEntity getOSEntityForHost(Host host,
                                       RepositoryVersionEntity repoVersion)
                                throws SystemException
        Return repositories available for target os version on host based on repoVersion repository definition
        Parameters:
        host - target Host for providing repositories list
        repoVersion - RepositoryVersionEntity version definition with all available repositories
        Returns:
        RepoOsEntity with available repositories for host
        Throws:
        SystemException - if no repository available for target Host

        Throws:

      • getCommandRepository

        public CommandRepository getCommandRepository(Cluster cluster,
                                              ServiceComponent component,
                                              Host host)
                                       throws SystemException
        Builds repository information for inclusion in a command. This replaces escaping json on a command.
        Parameters:
        cluster - the cluster
        host - the host
        component - ServiceComponent object, could be null to return service-related repository
        Returns:
        the command repository
        Throws:
        SystemException

      • addRepoInfoToHostLevelParams

        @Deprecated
public void addRepoInfoToHostLevelParams(Cluster cluster,
                                                     ActionExecutionContext actionContext,
                                                     RepositoryVersionEntity repositoryVersion,
                                                     Map<String,String> hostLevelParams,
                                                     String hostName)
                                              throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Deprecated. 
        This method builds and adds repo infoto hostLevelParams of action
        Parameters:
        cluster - cluster to which host level params belongs
        actionContext - context of the action. Must be not null
        repositoryVersion - repository version entity to use
        hostLevelParams - hasgmap with host level params. Must be not null
        hostName - host name to which add repo onfo
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

public String getRepoInfo(Cluster cluster,
                                      ServiceComponent component,
                                      Host host)
                               throws SystemException
        Deprecated. use getCommandRepository(Cluster, ServiceComponent, Host) instead.
        Get repository info given a cluster and host.
        Parameters:
        cluster - the cluster
        host - the host
        Returns:
        the repo info
        Throws:
